(2, 1).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(2, 1).description:
At the northern edge of the cavern system, this chamber serves as a natural gateway into the depths below.
Crystalline formations jut from the walls like frozen lightning, their pale luminescence casting dancing shadows
across the rough-hewn stone. The air carries a metallic tang mixed with the earthy scent of ancient rock, while
a persistent draft whispers of deeper passages yet unexplored.

(8, 1).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(8, 1).description:
The northeastern reaches of the cavern system stretch before you, marked by towering stone pillars that support
the weight of ages above. Veins of luminescent mineral deposits snake through the rock face, pulsing with an
ethereal glow that seems to respond to your presence. The chamber echoes with distant drippings and the subtle
groan of settling stone, reminders of the living mountain that surrounds you.

props.name: Gold
props.description: A small pouch containing 1 gold pieces.
props.announce: There's a small pouch of gold on the ground.

props.name: Draught
props.description:
A green fluid giving off a warm, pleasant glow.
Invigorating for any tired adventurer.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass bottle of glowing green fluid on the ground. Its label reads, simply, 'Draught.'

(2, 2).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(2, 2).description:
This junction chamber splits into multiple pathways, each tunnel mouth yawning like a hungry maw in the
crystal-lit gloom. The walls here bear the scars of ancient water flow, smooth grooves carved by millennia
of underground streams that have since found new courses. A crosswind stirs the air, carrying with it the
mingled scents of mineral deposits and the faint mustiness of unexplored depths.

(5, 2).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(5, 2).description:
A natural amphitheater of stone opens before you, its curved walls rising in terraced layers that seem to
focus sound toward the center. Ancient mineral deposits have created a stunning display of stratified colors,
each band telling the story of geological epochs. The acoustics here are remarkable - even the softest whisper
carries clearly across the chamber, while footsteps echo with an almost musical resonance.

(8, 2).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(8, 2).description:
The eastern passage constricts here, forcing travelers to duck beneath low-hanging rock formations that
jut down like the fangs of some primordial beast. Sharp crystalline protrusions catch what little light
filters through, creating a treacherous maze of glittering obstacles. The walls press close on either side,
and the ceiling seems to drop with each step forward, demanding careful navigation.

(1, 3).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(1, 3).description:
Along the western edge of the cavern system, this cramped passage forces even the most agile explorer to
crouch and weave between jutting stone formations. The air moves sluggishly here, thick with the accumulated
moisture of ages, and every surface gleams with a film of condensation. Despite the challenging terrain,
the passage offers glimpses of wider chambers beyond through narrow gaps in the rock.

(3, 3).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(3, 3).description:
This chamber pulses with an otherworldly energy, its walls lined with veins of phosphorescent crystal that
cast dancing patterns of rose-colored light across the uneven floor. The air here carries a faint metallic
taste, and strange harmonics seem to emanate from the very stones themselves. Ancient scratches on the walls
suggest this place has been visited before, though by whom or what remains a mystery.

props.name: Antidote
props.description:
A murky green fluid of questionable chemistry.
Drinking it restores a small amount of health and 
neutralizes harmful toxins in the bloodstream.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass bottle on the ground with a murky green fluid inside and a label reading, 'Antidote.'

(4, 3).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(4, 3).description:
A crossroads chamber where multiple passages converge, their entrances marked by naturally formed archways
of weathered limestone. The convergence creates interesting air currents that carry scents and sounds from
distant parts of the cavern system. Flowstone formations cascade down one wall like a frozen waterfall,
their rippled surface catching and reflecting the ambient crystal-light in mesmerizing patterns.

(6, 3).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(6, 3).description:
The northern portion of this chamber features a dramatic overhang of striated rock, its layers telling
the story of ancient seas and shifting continents. Beneath this natural shelter, the floor is carpeted
with fine crystalline sand that crunches softly underfoot. The overhang creates a natural acoustic chamber,
amplifying even the smallest sounds and lending an air of reverent solemnity to the space.

(7, 3).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(7, 3).description:
Ancient merchant remains rest against the far wall of this chamber, a grim reminder of the dangers that
lurk within these depths. The skeleton still clutches a weathered leather satchel, and scattered coins
glint among the bones. Despite the macabre scene, the chamber itself is striking - stalactites and
stalagmites have grown so close they nearly form complete columns, creating a natural colonnade.

props.name: Restorative
props.description:
A strange pink fluid of questionable chemistry.
Drinking it seems to cause your wounds to immediately mend themselves.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass vial on the ground with an odd pink fluid inside and a label reading, 'Restorative.'

props.name: Draught
props.description:
A green fluid giving off a warm, pleasant glow.
Invigorating for any tired adventurer.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass bottle of glowing green fluid on the ground. Its label reads, simply, 'Draught.'

props.name: Gold
props.description: A small pouch containing 23 gold pieces.
props.announce: There's a small pouch of gold on the ground.

props.name: Leather Cap
props.description: A simple leather cap offering modest protection without much weight.

props.name: Silver Ring
props.description:
A shiny silver ring. 
A small bauble favored by people of typically lower class.

props.name: Antidote
props.description:
A murky green fluid of questionable chemistry.
Drinking it restores a small amount of health and 
neutralizes harmful toxins in the bloodstream.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass bottle on the ground with a murky green fluid inside and a label reading, 'Antidote.'

props.name: Leather Gloves
props.description: Treated leather gloves that protect the hands without overly restricting movement.

props.name: Remains
props.description: The remains of an unfortunate merchant, trapped in the caverns long ago.
props.idle_message: There are some remains here, lying pitifully against the cavern wall.
props.announce: There are some remains here, lying pitifully against the cavern wall.

(1, 4).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(1, 4).description:
A treacherous waterlogged chamber where shallow pools reflect the ethereal glow of overhead crystals.
Submerged stone spires rise like the grasping fingers of ancient titans, creating a hazardous obstacle course
for the unwary traveler. The water is surprisingly warm, heated by geothermal vents deep beneath the surface,
and wisps of steam curl upward in ghostly spirals that dance in the crystal-light.

(4, 4).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(4, 4).description:
A narrow corridor stretches between towering walls of sedimentary rock, their layers visible like pages
in an ancient geological tome. The passage creates a natural wind tunnel, channeling air currents that
carry whispers of distant chambers and the faint scent of mineral springs. Phosphorescent lichen clings
to the upper reaches of the walls, providing just enough illumination to navigate safely.

(1, 5).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(1, 5).description:
A remarkable natural skylight pierces the cavern ceiling here, allowing precious sunlight to stream down
into the underground realm. The harsh brightness creates a stark contrast with the surrounding darkness,
while thick carpets of emerald moss have taken advantage of the light to colonize every available surface.
The intersection of surface and subterranean worlds creates an almost magical atmosphere of renewal.

props.name: Gold
props.description: A small pouch containing 1 gold pieces.
props.announce: There's a small pouch of gold on the ground.

props.name: Antidote
props.description:
A murky green fluid of questionable chemistry.
Drinking it restores a small amount of health and 
neutralizes harmful toxins in the bloodstream.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass bottle on the ground with a murky green fluid inside and a label reading, 'Antidote.'

(4, 5).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(4, 5).description:
The passage constricts dramatically here, forcing travelers to navigate between razor-sharp crystal formations
that jut from floor and ceiling like the teeth of some primordial trap. A melodic breeze flows through
the crystalline maze, creating haunting tones that seem to echo from the very heart of the mountain.
Despite the challenging terrain, the chamber possesses an otherworldly beauty that few dare to appreciate.

(6, 5).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(6, 5).description:
The cavern expands into a vast cathedral-like space here, its vaulted ceiling disappearing into shadows
that even the brightest crystal formations cannot penetrate. The silence is profound and almost oppressive,
broken only by the distant echo of dripping water and the soft whisper of air currents. Standing in this
space, one cannot help but feel dwarfed by the immense age and power of the living rock.

(7, 5).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(7, 5).description:
Another cathedral chamber stretches eastward from here, its soaring stone arches formed by eons of patient
water erosion. Scattered crystal clusters provide pools of soft light in the encompassing darkness, while
the air carries the faint mineral tang of deep earth. The overwhelming sense of space and time creates
an almost spiritual atmosphere that demands respect from any who venture into these ancient halls.

(3, 6).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(3, 6).description:
This smaller antechamber serves as a transitional space between the larger caverns, its intimate proportions
offering a welcome respite from the overwhelming vastness beyond. The walls here are smooth and curved,
polished by countless years of water flow, and decorated with veins of quartz that catch and amplify
the ambient light. The gentle acoustics make this an ideal place for rest and contemplation.

(5, 6).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(5, 6).description:
The heart of the great cathedral chamber system opens before you, where multiple passages converge beneath
a dome of living rock that rises beyond the reach of sight. Ancient flowstone cascades have frozen into
spectacular formations that resemble organ pipes and draperies. The acoustics here are extraordinary -
every footstep and whisper carries with crystalline clarity throughout the vast space.

(6, 6).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(6, 6).description:
A second natural skylight bathes this central chamber in golden rays that seem to transform the very
atmosphere of the cavern. Where the light touches stone, it reveals intricate mineral veins and hidden
crystal formations that sparkle like captured starlight. Lush moss gardens flourish in the radiance,
creating patches of verdant life that seem almost impossible in this subterranean realm.

(7, 6).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(7, 6).description:
An extensive flooded chamber where deeper pools mirror the ceiling's crystalline formations in perfect
reflection. The submerged landscape creates a dreamlike environment where up and down become confused,
and hidden stone pillars emerge from the depths like sleeping giants. The water here moves with subtle
currents that suggest connections to distant underground rivers and hidden springs.

(3, 7).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(3, 7).description:
A constricted passage that challenges even experienced spelunkers, where crystalline protrusions create
a natural obstacle course requiring careful navigation. The melodic wind that flows through these formations
produces haunting harmonies that seem to emanate from the very soul of the mountain. Each step must be
placed with precision to avoid the razor-sharp edges of the singing crystals.

(6, 7).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(6, 7).description:
The southern reaches of this chamber are dominated by a series of natural terraces carved from flowstone,
each level decorated with clusters of amethyst-hued crystals that pulse with inner light. The terraced
formation creates multiple levels of exploration, while the crystal formations cast prismatic patterns
across the walls that shift and dance with every movement of air through the chamber.

props.name: Antidote
props.description:
A murky green fluid of questionable chemistry.
Drinking it restores a small amount of health and 
neutralizes harmful toxins in the bloodstream.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass bottle on the ground with a murky green fluid inside and a label reading, 'Antidote.'

(8, 7).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(8, 7).description:
The easternmost passage contracts to barely shoulder-width here, forcing travelers to move single-file
between towering walls of sedimentary stone. Ancient fossils are embedded in these walls, their shapes
telling stories of creatures that lived eons before the caverns were formed. The narrow passage amplifies
every sound, creating an intimate acoustic environment that makes whispers seem thunderous.

(3, 8).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(3, 8).description:
A transitional chamber where multiple tunnel systems converge beneath a dome of weathered limestone.
The convergence creates complex air currents that carry the mixed scents of mineral deposits, distant
water sources, and the deep earth itself. Phosphorescent mineral veins trace geometric patterns across
the dome, creating a natural map of the geological forces that shaped this underground realm.

(4, 8).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(4, 8).description:
Another natural skylight illuminates this chamber, but here the light falls at a sharp angle, creating
dramatic contrasts between brilliant illumination and deep shadow. The interplay of light and darkness
reveals hidden alcoves and secret passages that might otherwise go unnoticed. Emerald moss cascades
down the walls like living waterfalls, thriving in the precious gift of surface light.

props.name: Antidote
props.description:
A murky green fluid of questionable chemistry.
Drinking it restores a small amount of health and 
neutralizes harmful toxins in the bloodstream.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass bottle on the ground with a murky green fluid inside and a label reading, 'Antidote.'

props.name: Restorative
props.description:
A strange pink fluid of questionable chemistry.
Drinking it seems to cause your wounds to immediately mend themselves.
props.announce: Jean notices a small glass vial on the ground with an odd pink fluid inside and a label reading, 'Restorative.'

props.name: Gold
props.description: A small pouch containing 1 gold pieces.
props.announce: There's a small pouch of gold on the ground.

(8, 8).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(8, 8).description:
The final skylight chamber marks the deepest extent of natural illumination within the cavern system.
Here, the light filters down through layers of crystal and stone, creating an ethereal atmosphere that
seems to bridge the gap between the surface world and the mysterious depths below. The chamber holds
an air of finality, as if marking the boundary between the known and the unknowable.

(1, 9).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(1, 9).description:
A remote western alcove where the cavern system reaches its furthest extent from the main passages.
The isolation here is profound, broken only by the distant echo of dripping water and the soft whisper
of air currents. Crystal formations in this chamber have grown undisturbed for millennia, creating
delicate spires and curtains that seem too fragile to exist in the harsh underground environment.

(2, 9).title: VerdetteCavernsRoom
(2, 9).description:
The lowest point of the accessible cavern system, where water has carved smooth channels through the
living rock over countless ages. Hidden stone formations rise from the shallow pools like ancient
monuments, their surfaces polished to mirror brightness by the constant caress of flowing water.
The gentle sound of trickling streams creates a peaceful counterpoint to the cavern's usual silence.

(5, 9).title: VerdetteCavernsSpring
(5, 9).description:
The unmistakable sound of water trickling over rock can be heard echoing throughout this small chamber. The air is filled
        with a fresh, life-giving smell that immediately improves Jean's mood. This would be an excellent place to stop for a short
        rest before continuing on.

props.name: HealingSpring
props.description: A burbling spring with fresh smelling water. It is clean and very inviting.
props.idle_message: There is a small spring bubbling here.
props.announce: There is a small spring bubbling here.
